summary: This is an email chain from April 23, 2021, between Assistant U.S. Attorneys and Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team regarding the government's expert disclosure in the case US v. Maxwell. It includes attachments of the expert notice, 3500 material for the expert witness, and a cover letter, with instructions to send copies to Maxwell at the MDC (Metropolitan Detention Center).

persons.name: Bobbi Sternheim
persons.context: Appears as counsel for Ghislaine Maxwell, listed as a recipient of the government's expert disclosure materials.

persons.name: Laura Menninger
persons.context: Listed as a recipient of the government's expert disclosure email, indicating she is part of Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team.

persons.name: Jeff Pagliuca

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the case US v. Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN), to whom materials are being sent at the MDC (Metropolitan Detention Center).

events.title: Government Expert Disclosure in US v. Maxwell
events.description: The government sends its expert notice and request for reciprocal disclosures, along with 3500 material for its expert witness, to Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated April 23, 2021, regarding the criminal case US v. Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN).
The government is providing expert disclosure materials, including an expert notice and 3500 material, to Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team.
Ghislaine Maxwell is incarcerated at the MDC (Metropolitan Detention Center) at this time.
The defense team includes attorneys Bobbi Sternheim, Laura Menninger, and Jeff Pagliuca.
